amendment.description: Amendment protects funds provided for science under title 3 of the Department of Energy's energy programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of the Department of Energy Organization Act.

action.text: Amendment (A053) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
